name: Cankerblades
description: Lean and fast as fungal blades themselves, the Cankerblades strike from unseen places and leave only rot behind. They do not walk toward battle â€” they appear within it, and tear.
abilities: Fungal Blades: When this model makes an attack, if the target is wounded, they must make a Resolve test. If they fail, they suffer -1 to their Movement until the end of the round.
Spore-Fueled Speed: This model can re-roll one failed Movement test per activation.
